thread.title: Watch: Deepika Padukone and Ranbir Kapoor’s ‘Matargashti’
thread.title_full: Watch: Deepika Padukone and Ranbir Kapoor’s ‘Matargashti’ - The Times of India

author: Ruchi Kaushal
title: Watch: Deepika Padukone and Ranbir Kapoor’s ‘Matargashti’
text:
No one can do 'Matargashti' better than Ranbir Kapoor, who has done it to the hilt in Dev Anand's Prem Pujari style in the first Tamasha song, 'Matargashti.' Matching steps with him, Deepika Padukone has recreated the Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani magic.
READ: Tamasha: The making
Dancing his heart out, Ranbir Kapoor is at his best in the song that has been sung by Mohit Chauhan. Beautifully picturised in the sunlit Corsica, the melodious number has been composed by AR Rahman.
'Matargashti' gives an insight into what Imtiaz Ali's Tamasha has to offer.
